name: Burg_81
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with Riveric loanwords
meals centered on salted fish, tubers, fermented seaweed
seamanship rites tied to ancestor veneration
barter-heavy, favors and oaths valued over coin
constraints: no instant resurrection or true life-replacement magics
long-range mind influence rare and institutionally banned
combustion industry limited; no high-pressure steam megatechs
notes: relies on incoming ships for most imported reagents
seasonal storms can isolate the outpost for weeks
local ritual workshops require imported, scarce components
